targets.query: SELECT last("downstreammax") FROM "fritzbox" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)
SELECT last("value") FROM "fritzbox" WHERE ("type_instance" = 'uptime') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval)

SELECT last("model") AS "Model", "serialnumber" AS "Serial", "softwareversion" AS "SW Version", "external_ip" AS "IP", "number_of_hosts" AS "Number of network hosts",  "physicallinktype" AS "Link Type", "remote_pop" AS "Remote POP", "last_connection_error" AS "Last Connect Error", 
 "external_ipv6" AS "IPv6" FROM "fritzbox" WHERE $timeFilter LIMIT 1
SELECT mean("attenuation_downstream") * 0.1 FROM "fritzbox" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean("attenuation_upstream") * 0.1FROM "fritzbox" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean("snr_downstream")* 0.1 FROM "fritzbox" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("snr_upstream") * 0.1 FROM "fritzbox" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("downstreamphysicalmax")  FROM "fritzbox" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean("downstream_dsl_sync_max")* 1000 FROM "fritzbox" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean("downstreammax")  FROM "fritzbox" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean("upstreamphysicalmax")  FROM "fritzbox" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean("upstream_dsl_sync_max")* 1000 FROM "fritzbox" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT mean("upstreammax")  FROM "fritzbox" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT "totalbytesreceived" FROM "fritzbox" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT "totalbytessent" FROM "fritzbox" WHERE $timeFilter
SELECT cumulative_sum(non_negative_difference(last("totalbytesreceived"))) FROM "fritzbox" WHERE  $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) tz('Europe/Berlin')
SELECT cumulative_sum(non_negative_difference(last("totalbytessent"))) FROM "fritzbox" WHERE $timeFilter  GROUP BY time($__interval) tz('Europe/Berlin')
